DOC.detailed_description: A small group child hemiplegic cerebral palsy investigate 3D instrumented gait analysis . Muscle activity measure surface electromyography ( sEMG ) select low limb muscle group . Kinematic , Kinetic , sEMG data compare low limb walk without ankle foot orthosis . Data also compare healthy control group .
